author: Trish Deseine
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/160C Fan/Gas 4. Line a baking tray with aluminium foil. Wrap each piece of salmon in a slice of chorizo and place on the lined baking tray.  Bake for about 5 minutes until the salmon is cooked through and the chorizo is crisp. Remove from the oven and skewer each bite with a blanched mangetout onto a cocktail stick. Serve hot or warm.
ingredients: 200g/7oz skinless salmon fillet, cut into 15 bite-sized pieces,  15 wafer-thin chorizo slices,  15 mangetout, blanched and drained
